name: Chronicles Tribute
description:
A new combat demo inspired by dragon quest and persona 5. It aims to reduce menu and make the player feel more engaged with the battle by using more camera movement and effects while selecting his move choice

New mechanics:

Stances: Switch your player stance from physical to magical to alchemy to unlock different moves in battle to better suit you against your opponent

Physical attacks: Use 3 types of physical attacks each with its own quirck and special effect.

Unique features: Each stance provides the player with a unique defence mechanism (Parry, counter,status imunity).

Alchemy: Exchange body parts at the cost of a debuff to gain a massive boost to your combat ability.

Body Targeting: target the enemies specific body parts to limit his combat prowess.
